function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spatial distribution of hospitals and number of beds impact covid-19 spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of intervention measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient data for epidemic modeling","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unreliable early stage estimated number of infected humans due to unknown virus characteristics and rapid interventions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in patterns of movement of crowds and levels of economic development make it difficult to clarify which country’s data are most appropriate for simulating the trend of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of genetic algorithm to estimate parameters for dynamic model of covid-19 spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient sample data due to short time period and unknown infection rates","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large-scale detection program leading to underreporting of asymptomatic cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in using early small sample data to predict the epidemic situation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in population distribution, population flow, and medical resource detection affecting the spread of early epidemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in confirming the actual number of infected people who had already exited but had not been tested or had no symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of implementing quarantine with different intensities and intervention times to mitigate covid-19 spread.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on strict quarantines as the main epidemic prevention measure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate reduction in infected curves with a small number of infected humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient effectiveness of quarantine measures due to population density and distribution","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to increased peak value, extended peak arrival time, and longer epidemic duration","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unnecessary use of strict quarantines in mild epidemic situations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demonstrated need for huge investment in financial, material, and human resources for strict quarantines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low adherence to self-protection measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate effect on reducing peak value of infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-protection measures do not fundamentally cut off the path of spread of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to deviation from actual epidemic curve","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of self-protection measures on the spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mild effect on reducing the peak value of covid-19 infections","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of self-protection measures under strict quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unimaginable amount of self-protection resources needed to achieve ideal results","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital isolation measures leading to increased spread of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate number of medical beds for infected individuals","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective self-protection measures under strict quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient intervention time for designating hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectively quarantined cases in the crowds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitation in the number of medical beds","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of medical beds","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving the required number of medical beds","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Medical beds reaching full capacity leading to a large-scale outbreak","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Epidemic spreading to pre-intervention levels after a short period of containment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate home quarantine measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate supply of face masks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Study of covid-19 interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Model validation under covid-19 interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate quarantine measures and lockdown implementation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient medical beds and hospital isolation measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low proportion of people effectively wearing face masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difference between free spread trend of covid-19 in wuhan and early data from other countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Errors in case detection and data recording in wuhan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obvious difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete data related to epidemic cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
